about_the_game:
Test Subject is an intense single-player FPS action game that thrusts you into the role of an ordinary individual caught in an extraordinary situation. One moment you're living your life, the next you're abducted by beings not of this world. With no choice but to fight, you must rely on your wits, fists, and the power-ups you scavenge to escape a labyrinthine alien ship teeming with danger. Every fight is a test of your strength, resilience, and determination to regain your freedom.

Features

  • Core mechanics of the game are vaulting over obstacles and punching aliens

  • Some puzzles are required in order to progress through the game

  • Game Progression and Saving System:
    The game features five distinct levels, each designed to challenge your skills and determination. Levels must be completed sequentially—finish one to unlock the next. Along the way, you can collect power-ups that enhance your abilities. These power-ups will be permanently saved once you complete the level.

    If you’re defeated before reaching the end of a level, you’ll restart from the beginning of that level. The game employs an automatic save system that records your progress at the end of each level, ensuring you can pick up where you left off.

Test Subject is an intense single-player FPS action game that thrusts you into the role of an ordinary individual caught in an extraordinary situation. One moment you're living your life, the next you're abducted by beings not of this world. With no choice but to fight, you must rely on your wits, fists, and the power-ups you scavenge to escape a labyrinthine alien ship teeming with danger. Every fight is a test of your strength, resilience, and determination to regain your freedom.

Features

  • Core mechanics of the game are vaulting over obstacles and punching aliens

  • Game Progression and Saving System:
    The game features five distinct levels, each designed to challenge your skills and determination. Levels must be completed sequentially—finish one to unlock the next. Along the way, you can collect power-ups that enhance your abilities. These power-ups will be permanently saved once you complete the level.

    If you’re defeated before reaching the end of a level, you’ll restart from the beginning of that level. The game employs an automatic save system that records your progress at the end of each level, ensuring you can pick up where you left off.
name: Test Subject

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 560 (2-4 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 590 (4-6 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for performance settings at 1080p, 60 FPS. SSD recommended

short_description: An action-packed single-player FPS where you fight your way off an alien ship using fists and power-ups. Test your strength, wits, and resilience to survive and escape.
